    Function reference

    Fit data

    Functions to initialize data and fit them.

    init()
    Creates a biPOD object.
    breakpoints_inference()
    Fit growth model to bipod object
    fit()
    Fit growth model to bipod object
    fit_two_pop_model()
    Fit a two population growth

    Plot data

    Function to visualize data and results.

    plot_bayes_factor()
    Plot the fit over the input data.
    plot_breakpoints_posterior()
    Plot the posterior distributions of the inferred breakpoints.
    plot_elbo()
    Plot the logarithm of the ELBO and the delta ELBO mean obtained during the variational sampling.
    plot_fit()
    Plot the fit over the input data.
    plot_input()
    Plot the input data of the population over time
    plot_mixture_model_omega()
    Plot the fit over the input data.
    plot_normalized_growth_rate_posteriors()
    Produces a plot of the posteriors for the growth rates. The posteriors are renormalized such that their highest peaks is at 1.
    plot_posterior()
    Plot the posterior density for a desired parameter.
    plot_posteriors()
    Plot posterior densities for a set of desired parameter.
    plot_report()
    Plot traces of specified parameters from a fitted Stan model
    plot_t0_posterior()
    Plot posteriors of t0
    plot_traces()
    Plot traces of specified parameters from a fitted Stan model
    plot_two_pop_fit()
    Plot the fit over the input data.

    Simulate data

    Function to produce synthetic data.

    sim_stochastic_exponential()
    Simulate a stochastic birth-death process for multiple time steps
    sim_stochastic_logistic()
    Simulate population growth with logistic growth for multiple time steps

    Data

    Example dataset to perform analysis.

    xenografts
    Xenografts data
